pullRequests.title: generate all asset aspect ratios on build
pullRequests.bodyText:
Linked Issue
Closes #678
Description
Build script that generates aspect ratio definitions for all images in the public/assets directory. The script will also generate a Union Type of the SVG file names for use in the UndrawIllustration component.
Methodology Random GIF

pullRequests.title: Adding lazy loading to members page
pullRequests.bodyText: Closes #655 Description Virtual Coffee member's page is growing rapidly. In order to improve the perforamce of the member's page, loading = "lazy" and decoding="async" were added into the tag. Also to keep it uniformed and bit quicker with loading, added width=100% and aspect-ratio:1/1 into the members css section. Code of Conduct By submitting this pull request, you agree to follow our Code of Conduct

pullRequests.title: chore: updating github action for prettier formatting
pullRequests.bodyText:
Linked Issue
#700
Context for the PR
Over a year ago, there was already a pull request to add the formatting for PR
https://github.com/Virtual-Coffee/virtualcoffee.io/blob/main/.github/workflows/pr-format.yml
But it doesn't look like this workflow is currently running.
I checked the last few open PR's and it doesn't look like the formatting action is running.
I am trying to figure out how to get it working so every time someone creates a PR or makes changes, the format action will run.
closes #700

nonMemberFilePulls.title: Adding lazy loading to members page
nonMemberFilePulls.bodyText: Closes #655 Description Virtual Coffee member's page is growing rapidly. In order to improve the perforamce of the member's page, loading = "lazy" and decoding="async" were added into the tag. Also to keep it uniformed and bit quicker with loading, added width=100% and aspect-ratio:1/1 into the members css section. nonMemberFilePulls.title: chore: updating github action for prettier formatting
nonMemberFilePulls.bodyText:
Linked Issue
#700
Context for the PR
Over a year ago, there was already a pull request to add the formatting for PR
https://github.com/Virtual-Coffee/virtualcoffee.io/blob/main/.github/workflows/pr-format.yml
But it doesn't look like this workflow is currently running.
I checked the last few open PR's and it doesn't look like the formatting action is running.
I am trying to figure out how to get it working so every time someone creates a PR or makes changes, the format action will run.
closes #700
